description: The US says there is "no credible evidence" to convict Metin Topuz for aiding a terror group.
title: Metin Topuz: Turkish court jails US consulate employee for terror offences
title_page: Metin Topuz: Turkish court jails US consulate employee for terror offences - BBC News
maintext: He was acquitted on charges of espionage and trying to overthrow the government, but prosecutors later said he should face jail on the lesser charge of belonging to a terrorist organisation.
